hero.title: Welcome to G2
hero.desc: The gateway to success! This is a place where we manage all Zeus projects.

empty.title: No projects found
empty.desc: No projects found for the given search parameters.

create.title: Create a new project
create.desc: Create a new G2 project. You will have the option to add repositories in a later stage!

new.title: Create a new issue
new.desc: Create a new issue for one of the linked repositories.

empty.title: No issues available
empty.desc: Issues are used to track todos, bugs, feature requests, and more. As issues are created, they’ll appear here in a searchable and filterable list.

unmatched.title: No issues found for the given parameters

new.title: Create a new pull request
new.desc: Create a new pull request for one of the linked repositories.

empty.title: No pull requests available
empty.desc: Pull requests help you collaborate on code with other people. As pull requests are created, they’ll appear here in a searchable and filterable list.

unmatched.title: No pull requests found for the given parameters

empty.title: No branches available
empty.desc: When branches become available they will appear here.

unmatched.title: No branches found for the given parameters

empty.title: No repositories available
empty.desc: Click the button bellow to link repositories to this project.

unmatched.title: No repositories found for the given parameters

tags.delete: Are you sure you want to delete this tag? This cannot be undone!

empty.title: No tags available
empty.desc: When tags become available they will appear here.

unmatched.title: No tags found for the given parameters

login.title: Login
login.desc: Choose one of the following options to continue.

401.description: You are currently nog logged in. Please login and try again!

404.description: We cannot find the page you are looking for. The page is no longer available or was moved to a different location.

500.description: We are having issues with the server. Please try again later.

502.description: We are having issues with the server. Please try again later.

network.description: We are unable to connect to the server to retrieve information. Please check if you have a valid internet connection & try again later.
